page.title: 17GUIDES
page.content: Every Monday night at 7.00 pm a group of girls meet down by the church in our Guide Hut. The hut was once a house for two shepherds but it has been cleared out and is now a Guide Hut . Guides finishes at 8.30pm. Our subs are 25p a week. We go out a lot and sometimes have sports day. We celebrate certain years of Guiding and have parties,we also have parties for Hallowe'en, Christmas and Easter. Some of our Guides went down to Oxford to celebrate 75 years of Guiding in June 1985. We go to to camp every year so we have lessons on it, we also cook outside. We do sponsored walks and things for charity. We have a good time at Guides.
